data.message: I love how every Trump fan is butthurt over Eminem. Lol. "I'll never give another dollar to him" lol! Pretty sure he's doing alright without your money. There are too many people suddenly into politics these days...boring, even with Trumps personality. Get over yourselves people...lighten the F up, he's been slashing just about everyone since he started.

replies.message: People are so mad over him dissing Trump. If they listened to Mosh or White America they'd know this isn't his first time attacking the president

Well you see, that’s thing about Trump and his supporters. They think the world revolves around them. They think they’re so high and mighty that people actually give a fuck about them boycotting or crying. If they don’t like him, then why the fuck are they on his page? Lol
